body_html:
Thanks @ezyang, all I can think of is either

  • rebuild libtorch in test.sh
  • or, pass an exclude rule to git clean that preserves what is in tools/cpp_build/build/Install (or whatever location we want to use to store the build files)

What do you think?
body_text:
Thanks @ezyang, all I can think of is either

rebuild libtorch in test.sh
or, pass an exclude rule to git clean that preserves what is in tools/cpp_build/build/Install (or whatever location we want to use to store the build files)

What do you think?
body:
Thanks @ezyang, all I can think of is either
- rebuild `libtorch` in `test.sh`
- or, pass an `exclude` rule to `git clean` that preserves what is in `tools/cpp_build/build/Install` (or whatever location we want to use to store the build files)

What do you think?
